name: Knight of the Dead
description:
In Knight of the Dead, the apocalypse is upon us. To run from the inevitable horde, one must consider their moves wisely, lest time, and the undead, catch up to them.

Features:

  • 13 Different Items
  • 5 Unique Spells
  • 3 Enemies
  • 1 Music Track
  • A User Manual
  • Enticing Menu-Based Gameplay

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys - Scroll Menu
  • X - Select
  • Z - Back
